SourceNotes: MS Hist 47 contains three copies of these statutes
GeneralNotes: Summary of rubrics in Binz, Vie religieuse, 175-76

orders all curates to have copies of either Manipulus curatorum of Guy de Montrocher or the work of a certain William, Bp of Paris [perhaps Dialogus de septem sacramentis of the dominican Guillaume de Paris]
SourceOther: Geneva, AE, MS hist 47, f° 90-96 [incomplete]; fols. 97-102v
